trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging" /> event, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing" /> event, or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging" /> zdarzenia <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing" /> zdarzenia lub <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting" /> zdarzenie <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventHandler> delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> event, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Metody określonej w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventHandler> delegata jest wywoływane, gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> zdarzeń, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> zdarzenia lub <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Strona deweloperzy mogą podać niestandardowe programy obsługi zdarzeń części sieci Web, dodając `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` atrybutu, `OnWebPartClosing` atrybutu, lub `OnWebPartDeleting` atrybutu `<asp:webpartmanager>` element w stronę i przypisywanie nazwę niestandardowej metody z atrybutem.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Obsługa niestandardowych można przypisać również programowo.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat programowo przypisywania program obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [NIB: jak: Połącz metody obsługi zdarzeń do zdarzenia](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
